Class Internship

java.lang.Object
sc2002_grpproject.entity.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an internship posting in the system. Internships are created by company representatives and must be approved by staff.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Internship with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String title, String description, String companyName, CompanyRepresentative rep, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, int slots, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate)
      Constructs a new Internship with the specified details. Initial status is PENDING and visibility is false.
      Parameters:
      title - the internship title
      description - the internship description
      companyName - the name of the company offering the internship
      rep - the company representative in charge
      level - the required level (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED)
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for applicants
      slots - the number of available positions
      openingDate - the date applications open
      closingDate - the date applications close

    • incrementConfirmedPlacements

      public void incrementConfirmedPlacements()
      Increments the number of confirmed placements. If slots are filled, status is set to FILLED.

    • decrementConfirmedPlacements

      public void decrementConfirmedPlacements()
      Decrements the number of confirmed placements. If previously filled, status is changed back to APPROVED.
